org.corfudb.runtime.view

Class Address

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.view.Address

  • public class Address
extends Object
    Currently, this class holds static constants used to represent addresses. In the future, it may replace the use of long depending on performance.

    Created by mwei on 1/6/17.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long ABORTED
      Aborted request constant.
      static long COW_BACKPOINTER
      Indicates that the previous entry in the stream belongs to another stream.
      static long MAX
      The maximum address.
      static long NEVER_READ
      This is a constant use for initializing addresses before 0 is read.
      static long NO_BACKPOINTER
      Constant to indicate that no backpointer is available for the given stream (due to reset).
      static long NON_ADDRESS 
      static long NON_EXIST
      A non-existing address constant.
      static long NOT_FOUND
      Not found constant.
      static long OPTIMISTIC
      Optimistic constant.

    • Field Detail

      • NON_ADDRESS

        public static long NON_ADDRESS

      • MAX

        public static final long MAX
        The maximum address.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ABORTED

        public static final long ABORTED
        Aborted request constant. Used to indicate an attempted read, but was rejected at the request of the client.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOT_FOUND

        public static final long NOT_FOUND
        Not found constant. Used to indicate that a search for an entry did not result in a entry.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPTIMISTIC

        public static final long OPTIMISTIC
        Optimistic constant. Used to indicate that an update is optimistic.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NO_BACKPOINTER

        public static final long NO_BACKPOINTER
        Constant to indicate that no backpointer is available for the given stream (due to reset).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NON_EXIST

        public static final long NON_EXIST
        A non-existing address constant. Indicating that an address was request, but no match exists.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NEVER_READ

        public static final long NEVER_READ
        This is a constant use for initializing addresses before 0 is read. to be consistent, a initial position already "consumed" is -1L
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COW_BACKPOINTER

        public static final long COW_BACKPOINTER
        Indicates that the previous entry in the stream belongs to another stream.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • nonAddress

        public static boolean nonAddress(long addr)
        Returns whether a given address is a valid address or not.
        Parameters:
        addr - log address
        Returns:
        true for all flag non-address constants

      • isAddress

        public static boolean isAddress(long addr)
        Returns whether a given address is a valid address or not.
        Parameters:
        addr - log address
        Returns:
        true is addr is a legitimate address; false for all flag non-address constants

      • isMinAddress

        public static boolean isMinAddress(long addr)
